abstract: The Toyota Motor Corporation, on pace to become the world’s biggest auto company, reports a 7.3 percent gain.
snippet: The Toyota Motor Corporation, on pace to become the world’s biggest auto company, reports a 7.3 percent gain.
lead_paragraph: TOKYO, Feb. 6 — Another quarter of record profits and sales released Tuesday by Toyota Motor painted a picture of a company whose momentum is pushing it into a virtuous cycle and relentlessly closer to becoming the No. 1 global auto company, analysts said.

headline.main: Toyota Reports Record Profits and Sales in 4th Quarter
headline.print_headline: Toyota Reports Record Profits and Sales

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Utility Vehicles and Other Light Trucks
